description: Create a new Project within Ops Mananger for a specific Organisation

ops_manager_url.description: The URL, including port number, for the Ops Manager. Do not include the end point.

project_name.description: Name of the project to create

org_id.description: The ID of the Organisation (Retrieve from Ops Manager)

curl_token.description: Token associated with username for API call

curl_ca_cert_path.description: The path to the CA file if using SSL
